intro: Brandzeia, commonly known as the goldenbush, is a genus of flowering plants in the family Polygonaceae. It is native to southern Africa, particularly South Africa, where it thrives in arid and semi-arid regions. Brandzeia species are often used in ornamental gardening due to their drought tolerance and attractive foliage.
